value.name: Belleville Police Have Never Promoted A Latina Cop – Until Now
value.description: Frank Pignataro and Lt. William Washington – Bermudez took her oath, which represented a long-but-rewarding journey into the realm of law enforcement. According to township officials ...

value.name: Sex Offender Arrest, DUI, Stalking: Nashua Police Log
value.description: These and more were included in the Nashua police log May 8-12, 2017. William Washington, 48, of Manchester, was charged with second-degree assault, strangulation, and domestic violence.

value.name: Belleville Police Dept. promotes first Latina, two others
value.description: Barbara Bermudez was bursting with pride when she became the first Latina in the history of the Belleville Police Department to be promoted. “It’s just one more door that’s
